title: Can I audition for YG Entertainment if I'm 13 and I'm Indian? - Quora

response.answer_text: ANYONE FROM ANYWHERE CAN GIVE AUDITIONS TO KPOP.GIRLLL just go for it , it is the best age to audition for kpop entertainments.Be talented and DON’T give auditions if you don’t have talents or don’t audition just to see your favourite Idols or Oppa’s If you are giving auditions ALL THE BEST : )
